thread.title: Is Justin Bieber dropping hints about new songs?
thread.title_full: Is Justin Bieber dropping hints about new songs? | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Is Justin Bieber dropping hints about new songs?
text:
Other Articles Study sheds light on culinary habits of Stonehenge builders 'Fantasy Island' to get reboot with female protagonist Leonardo DiCaprio to make movie on Volkswagen scandal Justin Bieber, who is heavily promoting his upcoming album ‘Purpose’ on social media, seems to have dropped hints about his new tracks.
The 21-year-old singer recently posted few videos on his Instagram, in which he is seen painting walls and a unrecognisable track in his voice can be heard in the background, reports E! Online.
In another video, the ‘Baby’ hit-maker’s young singer is seen practicing some choreography and it was captioned, “Is it too late to say I’m sorry now?”
Previously Bieber took social media to start the countdown for the album drop and wrote, “One month to go…. Been 3 years in the making. #nov13 #purpose.”
 14, 2015 8:10 pm
